snippet.title: 《軒轅劍柒》實機展示：攀爬戰鬥 探索遺跡 Xuan-Yuan Sword VII Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Xuan-Yuan Sword is one of the most popular RPG series in Chinese-speaking regions, developed by SOFTSTAR, Domo studio in Taipei. Xuan-Yuan Sword franchise has had 30 years history with 12 published titles. Throughout these years, DOMO studio had rolled up its sleeves in adopting successful expansion into the global market. 

Xuan-Yuan Sword VII
Official Website: http://www.swd7.tw/main/index/en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/softstar.swd/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/XuanYuan_Sword
Weibo: https://www.weibo.com/softstarswd
Add to your wishlist：
Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1249800 

《軒轅劍柒》遊戲實機影片釋出！
主角太史昭和妹妹太史湘一同踏足深山，發現神秘機關遺跡。
攜劍迎戰，擊退來犯妖物；
攀爬蹲走，行至別有洞天；
啟動機關，解開昔日秘密。
塵封的大門徐徐打開，等待著你的究竟會是什麼？

在官網了解更多遊戲資訊~ 
官網：http://www.swd7.tw
Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/softstar.swd/
添加至願望清單：
Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1249800
